channel.title: The MGB Blog on University of Iowa Math Graduate Board
channel.description: Recent content in The MGB Blog on University of Iowa Math Graduate Board

item.title: (unofficial) UIowa Beamer Theme Released
item.description: Exciting News: Introducing the UIowa Beamer Theme! Thanks to the contributions of Alex Polenberg and Ethan Rooke the initial release of this beamer theme is ready for public consumption! This theme has been designed with the University of Iowa community in mind, and we are thrilled to share it with you.

item.title: Thoughts on qualifying exams
item.description: So, you’re gearing up for your Qualification Exams, but before you begin, I’d like to share a few thoughts about the exams and the preparation. This has less to do with the course material and more to do with the ’exam’ aspect of it.
